oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LAUD: A Computer Assisted Large Animal Unit-Dose System
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rivkin, Lawrence S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dose delivery system
inventory control
billing
prescription labels
computer assisted
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A unit-dose delivery system for large animals which utilizes the computer for inventory control, billing and prescription labels is described. Some formulations for oral, topical and injectable drugs are discussed and various methods of packaging are illustrated. Some formulation problems and their solutions are discussed. The LAUD System (large animal unit-dose) is used as a basis for obtaining a "closed" pharmacy within a veterinary teaching hospital.
